title: Gleamdance Dagger
content: Gleamdance Dagger Rare 3~6 Damage 1d4 +2 Piercing Gleamdance Dagger: Glowing: This object shines with a glowing light in a radius of 6m. Weapon Enchantment +2 Off-Hand OnlyGleamdancer: When this dagger is wielded in the off-hand, the wielder gains a +1 bonus to Armour Class. Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: A pair of pixie wings were used to create this pretty blade - their delicate tracings can be seen all day and night, though they shine brightest by the light of a gibbous moon.
